column3: College of Business, Law and Social Sciences
column5: Gain the insights, skills and professional credibility to help businesses meet the challenges of operating internationally. Our MSc will give you the edge as you prepare for a lucrative international management career in an era of rapid globalisation.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2-3 years part time
